text: Ara yara masajida nirmana kareche ksatisadhana [1], kuphari o muminadera madhye bibheda srstira uddesye ebam era age allah‌ o tamra rasulera birud'dhe ye lara'i kareche tara gopana ghatisbarupa byabaharera uddesye [2], ara tara abasa'i sapatha karabe, ‘amara kebala bhalo ceyechi;’ ara allah‌ saksya dicchena ye, abasya'i tara mithyabadi
